alert.note: Alert for Waushara; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 12:22PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Winnebago and northeastern Waushara Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Poygan, or 10 miles north of Berlin, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oshkosh, Lake Poygan, Omro, Winneconne, Butte Des Morts, Highland Shore, Larsen, Lake Butte Des Morts, Eaa and Orihula. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
